bumpy.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a bumpy surface is flat but has a lot of raised parts, so it is difficult to walk or drive on it
bumpy.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: The ground is bumpy in places.
bumpy.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a bumpy journey by car or plane is uncomfortable, with movements up and down because of bad road or weather conditions
bumpy.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: The plane made a bumpy landing.
